alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 1:19PM CST until December 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Marion, Boone County Except Southwest, Newton County Higher Elevations, Searcy County Lower Elevations, Boone County Higher Elevations, Newton County Lower Elevations, Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations and Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
